CustomField.description: Indicates if the entity acts as an agent promoting the goods or services of another entity (e.g., Sales Agent, Purchasing Agent). - If true, the entity acts as an agent.- If false, the entity does not act as an agent.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if the entity acts as an agent promoting the goods or services of another entity (e.g., Sales Agent, Purchasing Agent). - If true, the entity acts as an agent.- If false, the entity does not act as an agent.
CustomField.label: Is Agent
